text: (musalamaanon vah vakt yaad karo) jab tum sar zameen (makke) mein bahut kam aur bilkul bebas the usase sahame jaate the ki kaheen log tumako uchak na le jae to khuda ne tumako (madeene mein) panaah dee aur khaas apanee madad se tumhaaree taeed kee aur tumhe paak va paakeeza cheeze khaane ko dee taaki tum shukr guzaaree karo
